articles.title: Princess Diana's Car, A Gift From Prince Charles, Sells For $72,000 - NDTV
articles.description: A Ford Escort that once belonged to Diana, princess of Wales, was sold on Tuesday to a South American museum for more than 50,000 pounds ($69,200, 58,100 euros).
